title: German lebkuchen
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) honey', '100g (4 oz) treacle', '175g (6 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '350g (12 oz) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '3 oz diced candied citron', '30g (1 oz) chopped hazelnuts', 'For the icing', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '100ml (4 fl oz) water', '2 tablespoons icing sugar']
